text: Mackenzie Christine Foy (born November 10, 2000) is an American model and actress. She is best known for her role as Renesmee Cullen, the daughter of Bella Swan and Edward Cullen, in The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn â€“ Part 2. Her role as Renesmee earned her a Young Artist Award for Best Supporting Young Actress in a Feature Film.
